def-en: In the context of a knowledge graph, the task of predicting a new triple (that is not in the graph) based on the triples that are in the graph.
def-ga: I gcomthéacs graif eolais, tasc a bhfuil mar sprioc air abairt thriarach nua (nach bhfuil a ngraf) a réamhinsint bunaithe air na habairtí triaracha atá sa ngraf.

prov.réamhsinint: féach ar an téarma 'link prediction / réamhinsint nasc'
prov.nasc: féach ar an téarma 'link prediction / réamhinsint nasc'

notes: Féach ar an téarma 'link prediction / réamhinsint nasc'
